high_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti review: A GPU for wild times
high_impact_events.summary: An in-depth analysis and review of the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti, a high-performance graphics card that offers excellent performance at an attractive price point.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event has a high impact because it provides valuable information for consumers considering purchasing this GPU. It influences buying decisions and market perception.

medium_impact_events.headline: Nvidia to stop support for Windows 7, 8, 8.1, and Kepler GPUs soon
medium_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA announced that it will end the support for its GTX 600/700 series of graphics cards running on Windows operating systems such as Windows 7, 8, and 8.1.
medium_impact_events.rationale: This event has a moderate impact because it affects a significant number of users who are still using older operating systems, but does not directly affect the supply or availability of new graphics cards.

medium_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA ending support for Windows 7, 8, and older ‘Kepler’ GeForce GPUs soon
medium_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA announced that it will no longer provide updates or support for its Kepler-series graphics cards running on Windows operating systems such as Windows 7, 8, and 8.1.
medium_impact_events.rationale: Similar to the previous event, this is another product support termination announcement but affects a different group of users (Windows 7/8/8.1).

low_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang talks about the value of ethereum, advances in crypto mining and the global semiconductor shortage in a recent interview. Here are the 10 best quotes.
low_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA's Chief Executive Officer, Jensen Huang, discussed the company’s relationship with Ethereum, future advancements in crypto mining, and the ongoing global semiconductor supply chain issues during an interview.
low_impact_events.rationale: While this event involves high-level corporate discussions, it does not have a direct impact on product availability or market demand. It is more of an internal update rather than a public announcement.
